definition: A physical harm or damage to a specific body part, typically caused by an external force or impact. It commonly refers to injuries affecting the upper part of the human body, specifically the area above the neck.

examples.german: Er erlitt eine schwere Kopfverletzung bei dem Autounfall.
examples.english: He suffered a severe head injury in the car accident.
The head injury resulted in memory loss.

examples.german: Sie trug eine Schutzkappe, um Kopfverletzungen zu vermeiden.
examples.english: She wore a protective cap to prevent head injuries.

examples.german: Die Kopfverletzung erforderte eine sofortige medizinische Behandlung.
examples.english: The head injury required immediate medical treatment.
Head injuries can have serious consequences.
